name: George BUSSINGER, Appellee v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; The State Correctional Institution-Forest; Jeffery Beard, Secretary of Corrections; Debra K. name_abbreviation: Bussinger v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: George BUSSINGER, Appellee v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; The State Correctional Institution—Forest; Jeffery Beard, Secretary of Corrections; Debra K. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of July, 2014, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
96 A.3d 331
George BUSSINGER, Appellee v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; The State Correctional Institution—Forest; Jeffery Beard, Secretary of Corrections; Debra K.
